snippet: EverBank Financial Corporation, a bank based in Florida that went public last month, has agreed to acquire Business Property Lending, a unit of GE Capital, for $2.51 billion in cash.
abstract: EverBank Financial Corporation, a bank based in Florida that went public last month, has agreed to acquire Business Property Lending, a unit of GE Capital, for $2.51 billion in cash.

headline.main: GE Capital Sells Property Lending Unit for $2.51 Billion
